name: Doppelixir
description: The Doppelixir is a tiny ooze capable of imitating various liquids, making it an effective ambusher. It appears as an unassuming liquid when motionless, embodying a tactile, deceptive presence.
memorable: Notable for its ability to charm targets, compelling them to drink from it, leading to blood loss.
goals: To ambush and manipulate creatures, draining their life force.
relations: May serve alongside other oozes or creatures that utilize deception.
environment: Typically found in damp, shady areas where it can blend in with liquids.
strengths: Resists damage from acid, fire, necrotic, and slashing, and can ignore many conditions.
weaknesses: Low intelligence makes it vulnerable to intelligence-based attacks.
attacks: Slam attack that deals bludgeoning damage and allows it to attach and drain blood.
most_powerful_ability: Telepathic Urge, which charms a target, compelling them to approach and attempt to drink from the Doppelixir.
senses: Blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect creatures without sight.
skills: Possesses perception skills with a passive score of 11, indicating mild awareness.
additional_information: Can move through spaces as small as 1 foot wide without squeezing.
Imitates a wide range of common and uncommon liquids.
Does not require sleep, remaining active continuously.
Can move effortlessly across difficult surfaces and ceilings.
Leaves behind an imitation if it takes no damage from acid, fire, or poison when slain.
test_queries: tiny deceptive ooze that charms targets
creature that tricks enemies into drinking
